Compare Vectors and Matrix
```{r}
linkedin <- c(16,9,13,5,2,17,14)
facebook <- c(17,7,5,16,8,13,14)

linkedin > 15
facebook <= 10

linkedin > facebook

views <- matrix(c(linkedin, facebook), nrow=2, byrow=TRUE)

views

views == 14

```
Logigal Operators

```{r}
3 < 4 | 7 < 6
3 < 4 & 4 < 6

linkedin <= 10 & facebook == 13
linkedin <= 10 | facebook == 13
views > 11 & views < 14

```
IF Statement
```{r}
medium <- "Facebook"
num_views <- 14

if (medium == "Linkedin"){
  print ("Showing Linkedin Information ")
} else {
  print ("Unknow medium")
}

if (num_views > 15){
  print ("You're popular!")
} else {
  print ("Try to be more visible!")
}

if (medium == "Linkedin"){
  print ("Showing Linkedin Information ")
} else if (medium == "Facebook"){
  print ("Showing Facebook Information ")
} else {
  print ("Unknow medium")
}

```
ELSEIF 2.0
```{r}

number <- 75
result <- ""

if (number < 10){
  if (number < 5){
   result <- "extra small"
  }
  else {
   result <- "small"
  }
} else if (number < 100){
  result <- "medium"
} else{
  result <- "large"  
}

print(result)




```
